resources.string: Are you sure, you want to delete it.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

*** Note: for sprint one, the Camera is able to store images on a physical device. For emulator use, "picture" button does not save an image. ***
Use back arrow to return to previous page.
Take a picture of your item. This will help identify a product and serve as a thumbnail for the object in the inventory database.
